front.title: A Distributed ATMARP Service Using SCSP

abstract.t: This document describes a method for distributing an ATMARP service within a LIS[1]. This method uses the Server Cache Synchronization Protocol (SCSP)[2] to synchronize the ATMARP server databases within a LIS. When SCSP is used to synchronize the caches of ATMARP servers in a LIS, the LIS defines the boundary of an SCSP Server Group (SG).
